mapper.sql: withdraw.id as withdraw_id, withdraw.bank_card_id as withdraw_bank_card_id, withdraw.login_name as withdraw_login_name, withdraw.amount as withdraw_amount, withdraw.fee as withdraw_fee, withdraw.apply_notify_message as withdraw_apply_notify_message, withdraw.apply_notify_time as withdraw_apply_notify_time, withdraw.notify_message as withdraw_notify_message, withdraw.notify_time as withdraw_notify_time, withdraw.status as withdraw_status, withdraw.source as withdraw_source, withdraw.created_time as withdraw_created_time, bank_card.id as bank_card_id, bank_card.bank_code as bank_card_bank_code, bank_card.card_number as bank_card_card_number, bank_card.created_time as bank_card_created_time, bank_card.status as bank_card_status, bank_card.login_name as bank_card_login_name, bank_card.is_fast_pay_on as bank_card_is_fast_pay_on
mapper.insert: insert into withdraw (id, bank_card_id, login_name, amount, fee, status, source, created_time) value(#{id}, #{bankCardId}, #{loginName}, #{amount}, #{fee}, #{status}, #{source}, #{createdTime})
mapper.select: select from withdraw join bank_card on withdraw.bank_card_id = bank_card.id where withdraw.id = #{id}
select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) as amount from withdraw where status = 'SUCCESS' and login_name = #{loginName}
